location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: A printed map of the border region of the British Protectorate of Aden. The map is signed by Colonel R A Wahab, the Commissioner of the Aden Boundary Commission. The boundaries claimed by both the British and Ottoman Empires are marked on the map, as well as the boundary of Amir Dthala territory.
